cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 7th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 7th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: If youâ€™re looking to step up from our PODs, our Double Rooms feature a spacious double bed, shared kitchen, bathroom and laundry facilities. The bulk of our rooms are interior and designed to give you the best sleep.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Fully equipped and exclusively yours with private ensuite bathroom (shower, vanity and toilet).  Private room with Executive plush COMFI mattress with 1 Queen bed and under bed storage, TV, Wi-Fi, Linen, Towels.

privates.labelDescription: Twin Ensuite room.  A unique spot to rest and recharge, esp when travelling with friends or family. Take as long as you like getting ready for the day or living it up at night, you've got your own private bathroom, air-con and TV!
